Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for Device information and control.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image. The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image. This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image.

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image.

Integer.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Integer.Description: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image by the specified horizontal decimation factor.

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. This has the net effect of reducing the vertical resolution (height) of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition. It represents all the informations provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter but combined in one single value.

Enumeration.Name: PixelCoding
Enumeration.ToolTip: Coding of the pixels in the image.
Enumeration.Description: Coding of the pixels in the image. Raw gives the data in the native format of the sensor.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.
Enumeration.Description: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.

Integer.Name: WidthMin
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: WidthStep
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: HeightMin
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: HeightStep
Integer.Description: Description

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Transport layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Transport layer control features.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification.

Boolean.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Boolean.DisplayName: GEV Device Mode Is Big Endian

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceClass
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the class of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the class of the device.

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.
Enumeration.Description: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which physical network interface to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which physical network interface to control.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: MAC address of the network interface.
Integer.Description: MAC address of the network interface.

Enumeration.Name: GevSupportedOptionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOption
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.
Boolean.Description: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: It indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: It indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.ToolTip: It indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: It indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: It indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: It indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.
Boolean.DisplayName: GEV Supported IP Configuration Persistent IP

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.DisplayName: GEV Current IP Configuration Persistent IP

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the IP address for the given network interface.
Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the subnet mask of the given interface.
Integer.Description: Reports the subnet mask of the given interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.
Integer.Description: Reports the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.

Enumeration.Name: GevIPConfigurationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reports the current IP configuration status.
Enumeration.Description: Reports the current IP configuration status.

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file. The First URL is used as the first choice by the application to retrieve the XML device description file.

StringReg.Name: GevSecondURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the second URL to the XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the second URL to the XML device description file. This URL is an alternative if the application was unsuccessful to retrieve the device description file using the first URL.

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent IP address for this network interface.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent IP address for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the persistent default gateway for this network interface.
Integer.Description: Controls the persistent default gateway for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsUserDefinedName
Boolean.ToolTip: It indicates if the User-defined name register is supported.
Boolean.Description: It indicates if the User-defined name register is supported.
Boolean.DisplayName: GEV Supported Optional Commands User Defined Name

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsSerialNumber
Boolean.ToolTip: It indicates if the Serial number register is supported.
Boolean.Description: It indicates if the Serial number register is supported.
Boolean.DisplayName: GEV Supported Optional Commands Serial Number

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsEVENTDATA
Boolean.ToolTip: It indicates if the EVENTDATA_CMD and EVENTDATA_ACK are supported.
Boolean.Description: It indicates if the EVENTDATA_CMD and EVENTDATA_ACK are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsEVENT
Boolean.ToolTip: It indicates if the EVENT_CMD and EVENT_ACK are supported.
Boolean.Description: It indicates if the EVENT_CMD and EVENT_ACK are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsPACKETRESEND
Boolean.ToolTip: It indicates if the PACKETRESEND_CMD is supported.
Boolean.Description: It indicates if the PACKETRESEND_CMD is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsWRITEMEM
Boolean.ToolTip: It indicates if the WRITEMEM_CMD and WRITEMEM_ACK are supported.
Boolean.Description: It indicates if the WRITEMEM_CMD and WRITEMEM_ACK are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsConcatenation
Boolean.ToolTip: It indicates if the Multiple operations in a single message are supported.
Boolean.Description: It indicates if the Multiple operations in a single message are supported.

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Controls the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz).
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz).

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.
Command.Description: Latches the current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

Enumeration.Name: GevCCP
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the device access privilege of an application.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port to which the device must send messages.
Integer.Description: Controls the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Integer.Description: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevMCSP
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Enumeration.Name: GevSCPDirection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reports the direction of the stream channel.
Enumeration.Description: Reports the direction of the stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Index of network interface to use.
Integer.Description: Index of network interface to use.

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.
Boolean.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCSP
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.

Enumeration.Name: GevBlockIdVersion
Enumeration.ToolTip: Version1: old 16 bits block ID. Version2: new 64 bits block ID. Used by extended chuck data mode.
Enumeration.Description: Version1: old 16 bits block ID. Version2: new 64 bits block ID. Used by extended chuck data mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Version2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 64 bits block ID. Used by extended chuck data mode.
EnumEntry.Description: 64 bits block ID. Used by extended chuck data mode.

Category.Name: ChunkDataControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.

Boolean.Name: ChunkModeActive
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image.
Boolean.Description: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: This enumeration selects the chunk to configure. Once a chunk has been selected, all changes to the chunk settings will be applied to the selected chunk.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the chunk to configure. Once a chunk has been selected, all changes to the chunk settings will be applied to the selected chunk.

EnumEntry.Name: ChunkDetector
EnumEntry.Description: Metadata of image detector vales (integration time, timestamp, ...)

EnumEntry.Name: ChunkLockin
EnumEntry.Description: Metadata of lockin values (level, period, phase)

EnumEntry.Name: ChunkStatistics
EnumEntry.Description: Metadata of image statitics (min, max, mean, stddev)

Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: CameraConfigurationSize
Integer.Description: Description

Enumeration.Description: Description

Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: CamConfDefaultOffestX

Integer.Name: CamConfDefaultDetectorBias
Integer.Description: Camera Configuration Detector Bias

Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: IntegrationSelector
Integer.Description: Integration Selector

Enumeration.Name: SynchronizationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Float.Name: DetectorGpol
Float.Description: Detector Gpol (mV) for current configuration. 0 is undefined value.

Integer.Name: DetectorGain
Integer.Description: Detector Gain for current configuration. -1 is undefined value.

Integer.Name: DetectorBias
Integer.Description: Detector Bias for current configuration. -1 is undefined value.

Integer.Name: NucFrameAccumulateCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames accumulated during the NUC process.
Integer.Description: Number of frames accumulated during the NUC process.

Boolean.Name: WindowingIsConfLocked
Boolean.ToolTip: The current windowing is locked with Nuc file. Please reset the Nuc,
Boolean.Description: The current windowing is locked with Nuc file. Please reset the Nuc,

Command.Name: ResetNuc
Command.ToolTip: Reset the current Nuc. Allow the windowing.
Command.Description: Reset the current Nuc. Allow the windowing.

Enumeration.Name: DisplayVideoPalette
Enumeration.ToolTip: Display Video Palette
Enumeration.Description: Display Video Palette

Enumeration.Name: DisplayVideoPolarity
Enumeration.ToolTip: Display Video Polarity
Enumeration.Description: Display Video Polarity

Enumeration.Name: DisplayAgc
Enumeration.ToolTip: Display Agc
Enumeration.Description: Display Agc

Integer.Name: DisplayBrightness
Integer.Description: Brightness

Enumeration.Name: BadPixelListMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Access mode of the bad pixel list. List=read list. Add=add a bad pixel (no index). Remove=remove a bad pixel at current index.
Enumeration.Description: Access mode of the bad pixel list. List=read list. Add=add a bad pixel (no index). Remove=remove a bad pixel at current index.

EnumEntry.Name: Disable
EnumEntry.Description: Edit the coordinates of a bad pixel at list index.

Integer.Name: BadPixelListIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Access to the bad pixel of this index. For "Add" mode, the index is invalid.
Integer.Description: Access to the bad pixel of this index.

Integer.Name: BadPixelListCount
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: BadPixelOffsetX
Integer.Description: Bad Pixel X coordinate.

Integer.Name: BadPixelOffsetY
Integer.Description: Bad Pixel Y coordinate.

Command.Name: BadPixelListApply
Command.ToolTip: Add a bad pixel (at current coordinates) or Remove a bad pixel (at current index).
Command.Description: Add a bad pixel (at current coordinates) or Remove a bad pixel (at current index).

Enumeration.Name: RecFileNameMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Enumeration.Name: RecFrameNumberMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Integer.Name: RecFrameNumber
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: RecPreTriggerFrameNumber
Integer.Description: Recorder PreTrigger Frame Number

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActionType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Trigger Action Type
Enumeration.Description: Trigger Action Type

Enumeration.Name: TriggerAction
Enumeration.ToolTip: Trigger Action
Enumeration.Description: Trigger Action

Enumeration.Name: CalibUnitType
Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Enumeration.Name: CalibSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Calibration LUT to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Calibration LUT to control. Index of LUT provides DL->Value.

Integer.Name: CalibLutIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.
Integer.Description: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.

Float.Name: CalibDlValue
Float.ToolTip: Returns the DL at entry CalibLutIndex of the LUT selected by CalibSelector.
Float.Description: Returns the DL at entry CalibLutIndex of the LUT selected by CalibSelector.

Float.Name: CalibLutValue
Float.ToolTip: Returns the Value at entry CalibDlValue of the LUT selected by CalibSelector.
Float.Description: Returns the Value at entry CalibDlValue of the LUT selected by CalibSelector.

Integer.Name: CalibLutSize
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: WheelPosition
Integer.Description: Wheel Position

Integer.Name: WheelPositionCount
Integer.Description: Description

Enumeration.Name: HomingStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Integer.Name: FocusPositionMin
Integer.Description: FocusPositionMin

Integer.Name: FocusPositionMax
Integer.Description: FocusPositionMin

Integer.Name: FocusPositionCurrent
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: ZoomPositionMin
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: ZoomPositionMax
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: ZoomPositionCurrent
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: SetFocusInfinity
Integer.Description: SetZoomInfinity value : 1 => Set Focus to Infinity value : 0 => Disable Focus to Infinity

Command.Name: ZoomAthermalizeRef
Command.Description: ZoomAthermalizeRef : Please disable the Focus Infinity before. (SetFocusInfinity must be false)

Integer.Name: SbnInverseTimeConstant
Integer.ToolTip: Scene base NUC : Inverse Time Constant
Integer.Description: Scene base NUC : Inverse Time Constant - Small value -> long time change - High value -> fast change

Command.Name: SbnResetOffset
Command.ToolTip: Scene base NUC : reset the correction
Command.Description: Scene base NUC : reset the correction

Enumeration.Name: StatusSystem
Enumeration.ToolTip: Status of the system. Failure means there is a global sytem problem.
Enumeration.Description: Status of the system. Failure means there is a global sytem problem.

Enumeration.Name: StatusDetector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Status of the detector. Failure means there is a problem at detector level.
Enumeration.Description: Status of the detector. Failure means there is a problem at detector level.

Enumeration.Name: StatusLens
Enumeration.ToolTip: Status of the lens. Failure means there is a problem at lens level.
Enumeration.Description: Status of the lens. Failure means there is a problem at lens level.

Enumeration.Name: StatusWheel
Enumeration.ToolTip: Status of the wheel. Failure means there is a problem at lens wheel.
Enumeration.Description: Status of the wheel. Failure means there is a problem at lens wheel.

Enumeration.Name: DetectorCoolerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Detector Cooler Mode
Enumeration.Description: Detector Cooler Mode

Enumeration.Name: DetectorCoolerModeStartup
Enumeration.ToolTip: Detector Cooler Mode Startup
Enumeration.Description: Detector Cooler Mode Startup

Enumeration.Name: DetectorCoolingStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Detector Cooling Status
Enumeration.Description: Detector Cooling Status

Float.Name: DetectorCooldownTime
Float.ToolTip: Global detector cooldown duration in minutes.
Float.Description: Global detector cooldown duration in minutes.

Float.Name: DetectorCooldownRateThresholdHigh
Float.ToolTip: DetectorCooldownRate measured between DetectorCooldownRateThresholdHigh and DetectorCooldownRateThresholdLow (Kelvin).
Float.Description: DetectorCooldownRate measured between DetectorCooldownRateThresholdHigh and DetectorCooldownRateThresholdLow (Kelvin).

Float.Name: DetectorCooldownRateThresholdLow
Float.ToolTip: DetectorCooldownRate measured between DetectorCooldownRateThresholdHigh and DetectorCooldownRateThresholdLow (Kelvin).
Float.Description: DetectorCooldownRate measured between DetectorCooldownRateThresholdHigh and DetectorCooldownRateThresholdLow (Kelvin).

Integer.Name: PowerCycleCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of Power Cycle of the system
Integer.Description: Number of Power Cycle of the system

Integer.Name: ChunkDetFrameIndex
Integer.Description: Detector frame index

Integer.Name: ChunkDetRelativeTimeStamp
Integer.Description: Detector relative time stamp in microseconds (zero at camera runtime)

Integer.Name: ChunkDetIntegrationIndex
Integer.Description: Detector index of multi-it

Integer.Name: ChunkDetPageIndex
Integer.Description: Detector page index

Integer.Name: ChunkLockinPeriod
Integer.Description: Lockin Period (us)

Integer.Name: ChunkLockinPhase
Integer.Description: Lockin Phase (us)

Integer.Name: ChunkStatImageSaturationDetected
Integer.Description: Statistic image saturation detected

Integer.Name: ChunkIrigEnable
Integer.Description: IRIG enable

Integer.Name: ChunkIrigDayOfTheYear
Integer.Description: IRIG Day of year (base 1)

Integer.Name: ChunkIrigTimeHour
Integer.Description: IRIG Hours

Integer.Name: ChunkIrigTimeMin
Integer.Description: IRIG Minutes

Integer.Name: ChunkIrigTimeSec
Integer.Description: IRIG Seconds

Integer.Name: ChunkIrigMicroSec
Integer.Description: IRIG micro seconds

Integer.Name: ChunkIrigYear
Integer.Description: IRIG Year (Base year 2000)

Integer.Name: ChunkImuValid
Integer.Description: Imu data are valid

Integer.Name: ChunkImuCalibrationSys
Integer.Description: Imu Calibration System from 0 (bad) up to 3 (perfect)

Integer.Name: ChunkImuCalibrationGyr
Integer.Description: Imu Calibration Gyroscope from 0 (bad) up to 3 (perfect)

Integer.Name: ChunkImuCalibrationAcc
Integer.Description: Imu Calibration Accelerometer from 0 (bad) up to 3 (perfect)

Integer.Name: ChunkImuCalibrationMag
Integer.Description: Imu Calibration Magnetometer from 0 (bad) up to 3 (perfect)

Integer.Name: ChunkMiscGpiState
Integer.Description: Misc GeneralPurposeInput value

Integer.Name: ChunkMiscCustomCounter
Integer.Description: Misc custom counter

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Integer parameter: 1 when grabbing, 0 when not

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the device.
